about_the_game:
WORLD of PIXEL ART
PAINT BY NUMBERS
DLC

All Your Paintings from "World of Art - learn with Jigsaw Puzzle" Collection will be available in this DLC!
Choose Your favorite pixelart resolution, a number of colors in Your palette and start painting!

Main Features:
- All paintings from WOA Gallery are available
- Change Difficulty Level - Pixels Size and Color Palette
- Access to all paintings from World of Art - learn with Jigsaw Puzzles
- Improvise - Paint Your own pixel art paintings
- Day/Night Modes,
- Choose Your favorite Font,
- Movable Paints pane,l
and more!

Enjoy and All the Best!

fullgame.name: WORLD OF ART learn with JIGSAW PUZZLES

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04
  • Processor: Dual core from Intel
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: nVidia GeForce
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Sound Card: nVidia GeForce 8600/9600GT

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: windows 7, 8, 10
  • Processor: Intel® i5
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 9.0c compatible
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: windows 7, 8, 10
  • Processor: Intel® i7
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce
  • Storage: 6 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 9.0c compatible

short_description: WORLD of (PIXEL) ART: PAINT BY NUMBERS - DLC - All Your favorite Paintings from "World of Art - learn with Jigsaw Puzzle" Collection! Choose Your favorite Pixel Art resolution, a number of colors in Your color palette and start painting!
supported_languages:
English*, Polish, German, Spanish - Spain, Japanese, Portuguese - Portugal, Portuguese - Brazil, Spanish - Latin America, Traditional Chinese, French, Italian, Arabic, Bulgarian, Czech, Danish, Dutch, Finnish, Greek, Hungarian, Korean, Norwegian, Romanian, Simplified Chinese, Thai, Turkish, Ukrainian, Vietnamese, Croatian, Estonian, Hebrew, Icelandic, Latvian, Lithuanian, Maori, Slovak, Slovenian
